means: 伸开四肢坐[躺]( sprawl的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: People are sprawled on makeshift beds in the cafeteria.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们懒散地躺在食堂里搭起的临时床铺上。

sentence.Network_en: Rolando lay sprawled on his stomach, snoring.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗兰多趴着睡着了，四肢摊开，打着呼噜。

sentence.Network_en: Burke was asleep, sprawled obliviously against the window.
sentence.Network_cn: 伯克无意识地摊开四肢靠着窗户睡着了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词汇注释_郝人多_新浪博客 ... 19. lean 倾斜；倚靠；倾向；依赖 21. sprawled 四肢伸开的 24. container 容器；集装箱.
He sprawled his signature over the paper ., 他在纸上潦草地签了名.
... blinking, photovoltaic) 太阳能板延绵布满 (sprawled) 其中，产生的电力已足够让区域内居家照明使用一年。
She sprawled out of the door ., 她挣扎着爬出了门外.

entry.tran: 四肢摊开地坐着(或躺着)的
entry.def: If you are sprawled somewhere, you are sitting or lying with your legs and arms spread out in a careless way.

example.ex: People are sprawled on makeshift beds in the cafeteria...
example.tran: 人们懒散地躺在食堂里搭起的临时床铺上。

example.ex: Rolando lay sprawled on his stomach, snoring.
example.tran: 罗兰多趴着睡着了，四肢摊开，打着呼噜。
